dashboard.title: Analytics Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your business today.
dashboard.error: Failed to load dashboard data. Please try again later.

footer.projectDescription: Full-stack analytics dashboard showcasing modern data visualization, REST API integration, and clean architecture.

about.title: About This Project
about.subtitle: A full-stack analytics dashboard showcasing modern web development practices, interactive data visualization, and cloud integration.

projectOverview.title: Project Overview
projectOverview.paragraph1: This dashboard was built to demonstrate proficiency in modern full-stack development. It showcases the ability to create complex, data-driven applications with attention to user experience, performance, and code quality.
projectOverview.paragraph2: The application features real-time data visualization, responsive design, dark mode support, and a complete backend infrastructure using MongoDB Atlas for cloud database hosting.
projectOverview.paragraph3: All code follows industry best practices including conventional commits, code formatting with Prettier, linting with ESLint, and pre-commit hooks to ensure consistent code quality.

dataVisualization.title: Interactive Data Visualization
dataVisualization.description: Built with Recharts to display revenue trends, traffic sources, sales distribution, and user growth with responsive, animated charts.

mongodbIntegration.title: MongoDB Atlas Integration
mongodbIntegration.description: Cloud-hosted database with Mongoose ODM for flexible data modeling. REST API endpoints handle all CRUD operations efficiently.

modernStack.title: Modern Tech Stack
modernStack.description: Next.js 16 with App Router and Turbopack for lightning-fast development. TypeScript ensures type safety across the entire application.

devPractices.title: Professional Development Practices
devPractices.description: ESLint, Prettier, Husky, and Commitlint ensure code quality. Conventional commits and proper git workflow throughout.
